form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your k6 load test, Lighthouse audit, and AI SEO analysis.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance under load.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Audit for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Use AI to analyze on-page SEO factors.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for the k6 test.
form.customProfileDescription: Manually configure VUs, duration, or stages for your test.
form.stagesDescription: Define a gradual ramp-up of load over time.

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your test history has been successfully cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test run is now in progress. You can monitor its progress.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Existing History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: You have an existing test history. Would you like to clear it before running this new test?

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test Running...
running.description: Please wait while your tests complete. This may take a few minutes.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or load previous test runs.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test to begin your history.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire test history.

deleteDialog.title: Delete this test?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been downloaded as a JSON file.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been loaded.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not import the file provided.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: Your entire test history has been cleared.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection? All requests within it will be lost.

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Requests you send will appear here.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request from your history?

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see a response.

toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Please enter a valid cURL command.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: The request has been loaded from the cURL command.
toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The body could not be formatted as JSON.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: The cURL command has been copied to your clipboard.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not create the cURL command.

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Quickly navigate to any part of the application.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: A lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing and API development platform.
about.localFirstDescription: All your test history and configurations are stored exclusively in your browser. No cloud databases, no accounts required.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: We combine load testing, web auditing, and API interaction into a single, seamless interface to streamline your workflow.
about.k6HowItWorks: K6 Commander spawns a grafana/k6 Docker container using your configuration. The results are sent to a local InfluxDB instance.
about.k6HowItWorks2: A live Grafana dashboard visualizes these metrics in real-time, giving you instant feedback on your application's performance.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Analyze core web vitals and more.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: We execute a Google Lighthouse process via `npx` in an isolated environment, targeting your specified URL.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: The resulting JSON report is parsed to create a summary view, and the full HTML report is saved for in-depth analysis.
about.seoHowItWorks: The app fetches the HTML content of your URL and sends it to the Google AI Platform via Genkit.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI model analyzes key SEO elements like tags and metadata, scores them, and provides actionable recommendations for improvement.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: A full-featured HTTP client built into the app. It uses the browser's native `fetch` API to send requests.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: Requests can be saved into collections for re-use, and all history is managed in your local storage.
about.stackDescription: The tools and technologies that power K6 Commander.
about.involvedDescription: This is an open-source project. Contributions are very welcome!
